title: Business Blueprint
description: Helping small businesses manage their daily operations by tracking their customer base, inventory, sales per customer, and issuing outstanding invoices.

title: Employee Directory
description: This Employee Directory was built using React. It displays a table of all employees and allows the user to either sort the table or search the table for an employee by their First Name, Last Name, Phone Number, Email Address, or Department.

title: Hikes & Hops
description: Burn some calories and then reward yourself with a delicious meal! With this application you start with searching for hikes nearby your current location, or search for a certain city/state. From there you can search restaurants that are nearby your chosen trail!

title: Express Note Taker
description: This is a note taking application to help you keep track of all the tasks life throw's at you. With this app you can create and save notes, view previously saved notes, and delete previously saved notes.

title: Workday Planner
description: This simple calendar application allows the user to save events for each hour of the work day! If the page refreshes, all of your data will be and will still be there for you!

title: Eat-Da-Burger App
description: Eat-Da-Burger! is a wish list of burgers that allows the user to input the name of a burger that they wish to devour to add it to their list! Once they've eaten their dream burger, they can move it to the list of Burger Battles Won!
